website_summaries.verdict: A basic smartphone that's easy to use with an impressive airtime package – the best pick if you're looking for a budget-friendly deal.
pros: An affordable package that includes the Galaxy J1 Luna triple the usual 120 minute airtime
Free airtime bundle with 360 minutes, 360 texts, and 360MB data
Smartphone with all the capabilities of the Android 6.0 Marshmallow
cons: At 4.5 inches, the screen is smaller than some of its competitors
A few reports of faulty SIM cards

customer_reviews.title: it's about 1000% better than my last Tracfone
customer_reviews.text: I just bought this phone as an upgrade and wow, it's about 1000% better than my last Tracfone, which was the LG Lucky. Very fast, nice big screen, the cameras are really sharp, as well as the video, and I love that the Swype option is available for the keyboard. Setup took me all of 5 minutes. This is SO much better!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa W.

customer_reviews.title: ... than a month before it started crashing and showing bad SIM card errors
customer_reviews.text: This phone lasted less than a month before it started crashing and showing bad SIM card errors. No odd apps were installed, and it wasn't dropped. It became useless and will be returned.
customer_reviews.author: Mike In NJ

customer_reviews.title: Great phone!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great phone. Much better than the ZTE I had before. Easy to operate, much simpler and responsive. I have used TracFone for about 10 years and I highly recommend it. The set-up and maintenance (airtime, etc.) can all be done on-line. You can get balances, everything you need.
customer_reviews.author: naturalbornshopper

customer_reviews.title: Smudgy Screen
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what the difference in the screens are from phone to phone, but this shows every little smudge very clearly compared to my old phone. Annoying to have to wipe it off constantly. Also not ANT+ compatible if you are into those type of devices. (fitness stuff) Otherwise it works as expected. If you plan to put music on it make sure to get a storage card because this comes at like 5 or 6 of the 8 GB used.
customer_reviews.author: Robert K.

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Phone is great for the price. I decided to upgrade from my old non-smart finally. Transferring my number was easy and the prepaid card that came with it was automatically added when I activated. Camera takes decent pictures and pages load pretty quickly. I added a 8GB memory card to make sure I had room for any pics I snapped while on vacation. I'm not all that tech savvy so all the memory, software, etc... stuff escapes me. I just know that it works well for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: D. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Really a great phone. It runs smoothly, has all the emojis every Samsung phone has and etc. This isn't the typical "starter" smart phone, It's something I would get if anything ever happened to my Samsung galaxy s7 edge. The only slight down fall is the picture quality but for the price, you can't argue that you didn't get your money worth.
customer_reviews.author: Partin

customer_reviews.title: it has fairly good 4G wireless connectivity
customer_reviews.text: Yes this phone has met all my expectations and is well worth the money. It works very well as a phone, text messaging system and although I mostly use it on WiFi, it has fairly good 4G wireless connectivity. TracFone and this phone are great for people like me, who want a good reliable phone and when needed a means to text, check email and do some web surfing.
customer_reviews.author: denyl

customer_reviews.title: I love this phone
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone!! It is used everyday and has a wonderful alarm!! I plan to purchase another!! love this phone. The camera is easy to use and takes great pictures...easy to text and set up is easy also!!
customer_reviews.author: Dewayne Dees

customer_reviews.title: I really like this new phone so far
customer_reviews.text: I really like this new phone so far. I am still learning where everything is on it though. There are a couple things that I wish it had. One is a blinking light, letting me know that I have a message or notification, and I do wish it had more internal memory. I didn't realize how much was already being used by the apps, etc. that come on the phone. So a memory card is a definite must if you purchase this phone and want to install anything else onto it, like games or photos.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Geisenheimer

customer_reviews.title: the on/off button was a problem from day one but I did not expect complete failure rendering the phone useless. I should have returned it within the first ...
customer_reviews.text: This phone lasted less than 3 months. the on/off button was a problem from day one but I did not expect complete failure rendering the phone useless. I should have returned it within the first 30 days but I assumed the on/off switch was difficult but would continue to work as it was. My mistake. My cell phone use is occasional at best so that gives you an idea of how poorly the components of this phone are made. Amazon has a return policy of 30 days no questions asked but I should think the seller warranty should be longer than that?
customer_reviews.author: Scott Fredrickson

customer_reviews.title: A worthy purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Much faster than my LG smartphone. The side mounted power button is somewhat problematic, but it just takes some getting use to. All in all a worthy purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Tracfone will not activate
customer_reviews.text: TracFone Customer for years (all cell phones) Have the exact phone (approx. 6 months old) Great Phone!!!! BUT TRACFONE refused to Activate the Phone I just ordered & received. Spoke to a Supervisor who said with the new 5G Network coming the Phone I just ordered (4G) would not work ???? My current phone (4G) works fine !!! The exact phones I just ordered a (4G) cannot be Activated !!!! WHATS GOING ON ???
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great phone
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cell phone for my teenager daughter, because the price is good, the Samsung brand is a good quality, also, because this cellphone doesn't look cheap. easy to use, and the tracfone service is very affordable. his is my second Samsung luna, and very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Fabiolini

customer_reviews.title: Should have stayed with other phone.
customer_reviews.text: Needed to upgrade to 4g. This phone did that but it lacks a number of convenient features that I had on my previous LG phone. The battery life is poor to say the least and I use the phone very lightly. There is no visual notification of unanswered calls or messages. There is no repetitious reminder of unanswered calls or messages that I can find. Since I don't use the phone much, I'll live with it but I went with the name and am very disappointed. As far as I can tell, there are precious few "nice" features to this phone.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Fallon

customer_reviews.title: This is a great phone it has all the features that I wanted
customer_reviews.text: This is a great phone it has all the features that I wanted. I like the Kernel version it is a lot faster than my old LG TracFone. It came preloaded with 120 min.which the phone triples. I'm happy with my new phone.I still like the adding time instead of having a phone plan.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Harbert

customer_reviews.title: this is a really great phone and the service seem very good for the ...
customer_reviews.text: I received the phone and set it up online with Tracfone with no issues. 120min airtime credits showed up once the phone was activated. I am still waiting for the catch....this is a really great phone and the service seem very good for the moment!! I have a new $700+ samsung provided by my work and I feel like this one runs even better then that..LOL. I am very happy at the moment with the phone and the Tracfone service.
customer_reviews.author: Randy D Kimball

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: First smart phone and I love it much more than I expected. I've been a holdout, refusing to be one of those people who have a phone glued to their hand at all times. I'm really happy with this phone.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Great phone. Great Upgrade.
customer_reviews.text: You really can not go wrong with this Sansung Galaxy! If you are just looking for an upgrade, this is a very nice telephone and does almost everything. I have had absolutely no problems with this phone and it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Penny R.

customer_reviews.title: Good Phone, Better Deal than Tracfone.com
customer_reviews.text: Better deal than Tracfone website because it includes the airtime, which I did get automatically without having to take any extra steps. Best RAM among Trafones until you get into the $300+ range so far. Both cameras take nice pictures for everyday use. Samsung does duplicate a lot of Google's standard apps, which is unfortunate because there's just not a lot of internal storage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No triple minutes as specified. Beware!
customer_reviews.text: When I tried to buy minutes tracfone would not honor tre triple minutes also a few apps uses up all of available memory. Returned it
customer_reviews.author: Ray T

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: TracFone makes this impossible to use. Every month I buy a pre paid card and load it successfully. However this month, it doesn't work. So I bought a second card, still nothing. I've been on the phone with TracFone customer service for *hours*. Even after several factory resets, they can't figure out the problem. I'm stuck with this dud phone and I'm out the additional cost of two phone cards.
customer_reviews.author: A. Russo

customer_reviews.title: maybe it will work for someone else.
customer_reviews.text: I have not even used it. Once I charged it up and was looking it over it seemed fine. It has an unlock pattern system. I entered the pattern but, then needed to register it with tracphone. I had to wait a week until I got some time to do so. When I went to unlock the phone the pattern would not take. I tried taking the battery out and even went on youtube to try and find ways to unlock or clear the code. No go. It simply will not unlock. Useless.
customer_reviews.author: B Blades

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use phone great for people who like easy
customer_reviews.text: I love my phone very easy to set up . very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't work in my area!
customer_reviews.text: Could not get it to work in my area! Was on the phone for two hours with TracFone and they couldn't get the problem solved! Had to send back.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: It worked well since I got this phone. No problems at all!
customer_reviews.author: MariaH

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: did not work sent back 5 weeks later still waiting on replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Frank N.

customer_reviews.title: A smart choice for a smartphone
customer_reviews.text: A very nice basic Verizon based TracFone smartphone, but you might want to consider the Galaxy Sky model - slightly larger, more internal memory, and larger icons in Easy mode.
customer_reviews.author: FLebel

customer_reviews.title: Ships Fast!
customer_reviews.text: Even thought it is not a very expensive phone. It is a great phone.
customer_reviews.author: Dulcis

customer_reviews.title: A, B, C, 1, 2, 3 . . .
customer_reviews.text: . . . Easy to program, easy to download apps, etc; A step-up from my older style Android and larger in size. Five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. M. R. Moriolé

customer_reviews.title: He has a small flip phone before and he was glad to finally get one
customer_reviews.text: This phone was purchased for my husband. He has a small flip phone before and he was glad to finally get one. It is easy to use, he can hear it ring and he can use it for more than just a phone. He has enjoyed it since he received.
customer_reviews.author: p goodrich

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was a present for my wife and she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: tucson.don

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the price. Does a ton of things without breaking the budget
customer_reviews.author: Lynn L. Northup

customer_reviews.title: What's Not to Like?
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with my Tracfone Samsung Galaxy phone. I have used Tracfone for a long time and wanted a larger screen with enough storage for easy use and quick downloads, etc.
customer_reviews.author: CatsCalling

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: This phone works great. An exceptional value for the money. Set up took 20 min or so.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My wife likes this phone better than any other she has owned.
customer_reviews.author: Donald M. Rychlik

customer_reviews.title: Great phone, good value.
customer_reviews.text: This is an upgrade to my old Tracfone and I am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Good phone and works great.
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift and has been well received and enjoyed.
customer_reviews.author: Mary J McKenzie

customer_reviews.title: You have to try it....
customer_reviews.text: Perfect phone for the basics, you can get all that you need on it, good performance even using it with a SD card.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: No 120 min card provided
customer_reviews.text: The phone works great, but did not come with the 120 min. Card. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Karen F. Rogal

customer_reviews.title: I now see why others love these smart phones
customer_reviews.text: my baby daughter is a geek a nerd and a bookworm with a MASTERS and she said Samsung dad Samsung, try that brand please and I'm very impressed with its user friendly technics. I now see why others love these smart phones.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Battery life
customer_reviews.text: The battery life is very bad. Not even using the phone very much and still the battery needs to be charge frequently. Would not buy
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Moore

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: Awesome for my teenage daughters!!! Price is great and they like them !! Win win ...
customer_reviews.author: Sean Dowd

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Phone very nice sim card bad in process of replacing.
customer_reviews.author: vernon burton

customer_reviews.title: Horrible service, PR version defective
customer_reviews.text: Horrible service, PR version defective. Several problem with basic function of phone. Screen freezes. Horrible customer service 30 minutes or more of wait. Won't by againg.
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth porterfield

customer_reviews.title: whats not to like, and reliable
customer_reviews.text: tripled the minutes, texts and MB for life, whats not to like, and reliable service
customer_reviews.author: WILL LINDEN

customer_reviews.title: I like the phone but I should get a refund for ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the phone but I should get a refund for $22.00 as the price was reduced before I received. That kind a made me mad, I am learning to use it and its a lot faster than my Moto E. very good reception. I how would I get a refund??
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Met my expectations!
customer_reviews.text: The phone arrived in perfect shape. The package was delivered when it was scheduled. The phone is a wonderful upgrade from the LG phone I previously had. Easy to use and all the features I need or want.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Swenson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best Value out there for a phone, great monthly cost to own.
customer_reviews.author: SolarRay

customer_reviews.title: Not the best phone. Doesn't stay connected to wifi
customer_reviews.text: Not the best phone. Doesn't stay connected to wifi. But good started phone
customer_reviews.author: Audrey K.

customer_reviews.title: new tracfone
customer_reviews.text: The phone arrived faster than expected. I am satisfied with the phone and the $30 air time. I just purchased 1000 text for $5.00 I hope it will last I am happy as of now
customer_reviews.author: Charles McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Like my tracfone
customer_reviews.text: I like it and the triple the minutes on it. Still trying to figure out some of the things on it. But otherwise it's good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good phone, poor battery.
customer_reviews.text: This phone is pretty snappy and does what I've come to expect of a smart phone. Battery life is horrible. If I'm not charging this thing up every day I'm charging it up damn near that! I would not take this phone camping, it wouldn't last the whole weekend!
customer_reviews.author: Vornan19

customer_reviews.title: Free minutes are not real
customer_reviews.text: The free 30 minutes seems to be a blatant lie, there are no minutes on this account, despite turning the phone off and allowing refresh time repeatedly. I also had extreme trouble activating the device and never managed to transfer my old phone number to the new device, which I wanted to do.
customer_reviews.author: B. Krueger

customer_reviews.title: I like my phone
customer_reviews.text: I like the phone just wish it would stay charged longer
customer_reviews.author: ellie

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this phone for a couple of weeks now, and so far I haven't had any issues with it. It works well and looks really stylish, especially for a Tracfone. It was a big upgrade from my old (Alcatel) one!
customer_reviews.author: M. Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: Nice Phone
customer_reviews.text: Very nice phone for the price. I don't use a phone like most of the phone addicted do, but it serves my needs. Texting, e-mail, calls, internet. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars
customer_reviews.text: I'm late in coming to Smartphones. Set-up was pretty clear and straight forward. I feel very cool with my new phone as opposed to my old phone with the slide out keyboard that I've had forever.
customer_reviews.author: Sade

customer_reviews.title: Nothing but issues
customer_reviews.text: It stopped working after a few months. When I first got it it had small issues here and there but eventually just stopped working. I had to buy a new phone. Tracfone couldn't figure out what was wrong with it. So I switched providers and phones.
customer_reviews.author: Reb

customer_reviews.title: If I could give 0 stars I would
customer_reviews.text: Worst provider ever, I spent over 12 hours trying to get a number transferred and they failed so I tried a new number, but they set it up in the wrong state, and erased the 3 month plan that came on the phone and won't fix it. I'm returning this piece of trash, and wouldn't recommend this horrible company to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: PJ Miller

customer_reviews.title: Puchased this package because it came with a 120 minute ...
customer_reviews.text: Puchased this package because it came with a 120 minute phone card. NO CARD included! Phone is OK but false advertising.
customer_reviews.author: Lois Hall

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: the screen cracked within the first few days . So I'm not inpressed
customer_reviews.author: Michael Bland

customer_reviews.title: Need warranty
customer_reviews.text: Port where phone charged last 2 months and stopped working, no company assistance in fixing.
customer_reviews.author: Elan Conger

customer_reviews.title: This one is great. It fits my needs right now
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new phone. This one is great. It fits my needs right now. I LOVE it!
customer_reviews.author: Pammie

customer_reviews.title: Where are all my minutes?
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was to get a lot of time on this phone but it says only until 4/2017?
customer_reviews.author: Rosebud K

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great phone for the price and set up was very easy
customer_reviews.author: clayhenry

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far I love this phone. Super easy to see screen and keyboard is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... been using this phone for a month and I love it. This is my first smart phone and ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this phone for a month and I love it. This is my first smart phone and it is amazing me with all it can do.

customer_reviews.title: Samsung phone
customer_reviews.text: love the phone, but never got the $30.00 phone card

customer_reviews.title: Nice phone
customer_reviews.text: Setup has been great. Looking forward to using this phone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This Samsung galaxy Luna makes my old device look real
customer_reviews.text: This Samsung galaxy Luna makes my old device look real slow
customer_reviews.author: john kramer

customer_reviews.title: Good phone
customer_reviews.text: Good phone, works well. This phone is good value for the money.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: okay phone rough time to get the thing activated and has a fast draining battery life

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Absolute junk...phone burned out 5 hours after opening the package
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Kind of crappy phone. Wish I spent the extra $50 for the galaxy sky.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: How ironic that the return window close on 3/27 and ...
customer_reviews.text: How ironic that the return window close on 3/27 and on 4/3 I start having issue with the phone. I keep getting error messages when trying to receive texts and I am NOT getting any either. smh
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like my tracfone Samsung j1 luna 4g lte prepaid phone
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: it will only work on version towelers and will not work on others rven after actervaited is juck
customer_reviews.author: john  bohn

customer_reviews.title: I guess this is a good phone if you can use it
customer_reviews.text: I guess this is a good phone if you can use it. Nothing is said to check to see if your area is an AT&T or Verizon served area. This has a sim card that would not work in my area. The phone was returned for refund and Amazon did their usual great job on that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: so so
customer_reviews.text: Having problems with accepting oncoming telephone calls. This luna really has a short battery life. I must recharge more frequently than I wish. The camera is an improvement over my prior tracphone. Just not totally pleased. Missing my old tracphone. The internet connection is definitely an improvement. Added a chip but cannot figure how it really works. Perhaps I am just a grumpy old man that was hoping for too much from what I thought would be an upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: milehi

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT waste your money on this package "Deal"
customer_reviews.text: This was advertised that it comes with 120 min of time... IT DOES NOT!!!! the cameras are terrible... neither camera takes a good picture. washed out and fuzzy... My friends have LG phones and they take real good pics. DO NOT waste your money on this package "Deal"
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: If all you want is a basic smart phone this one is great. I can use the android auto app in my car. It does the basic items like make calls, takes pictures, and use the internet both Wi-Fi and data plan. TracFone is fine for the person how does not use their phone much. I use the straight talk home phone system for my main phone.
customer_reviews.author: bookworm0097

customer_reviews.title: Samsung Is King
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace my lost Galaxy Stardust which was an amazing smartphone for the price and way better than my Alcatel (shudder). I've had this phone for a few months now and it keeps up with my Galaxy Note 5 just fine. Go Samsung!
customer_reviews.author: Unequivoca Darling

customer_reviews.title: Great product for buget price!
customer_reviews.text: I have been a long time customer of tracfone and will be in the future! The Samsung Galaxy Luna 4G LTE Smartphone is a year and 4 months old and is still working great without any issues. The microSD memory card is perfect for transfering pictures to my laptop and other non apple devices! The phone shell is rugged and can withstand dropping and backpocket storage. I did puchase a sreen protector so the screen will not crack and or ever scratch!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Farley

customer_reviews.title: nice free airtime
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice phone but as mentioned by someone else indeed half of the 8 gb capacity is taken to make it work. We installed a memorycard but still have to see what that does. Right now we can not figure that out. Suggestions are most welcome. And there was no free airtime with it in spite of the promise. A pincode was needed for that but that pincode was not included.
customer_reviews.author: Jim H.

customer_reviews.title: Phone good, Tracfone bad.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a birthday gift for my dad and he was pretty excited about it. I personally have this model of phone and it's been my favorite phone I own. Although fair warning the Tracfone company is awful, God be with you if you ever have to call customer service because you'll be in store for being on hold for a very long time and little actual help.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Shea

customer_reviews.title: Works fine for me
customer_reviews.text: Love this phone. I haven't had any trouble with it at all, but I use it as a phone and to text with. I don't do much else with it. I have gotten on the 'net a couple of times, and had no trouble with that either. Not too crazy about the ads that keep popping up for apps, but, again, as a phone it works well.
customer_reviews.author: Jypsycat

customer_reviews.title: I really like the phone
customer_reviews.text: I really like the phone, it's easy to use and the battery life is very good. It's best to turn off the Wi-Fi when you aren't using it to save battery life. I also turned off a lot of apps that I don't use.
customer_reviews.author: mixup

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding
customer_reviews.text: Very Nice Easy to See for older Seniors and easy activation There is a problem All the Ring tones are not loud. If you are not near the phone you will not here it ring. I have tried everyone of the Ringtones.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: which is poor at 8G
customer_reviews.text: it is just okay. I have to keep deleting files and some apps to save internal memory , which is poor at 8G. Most of this memory is used by google services and updates. this makes downloading additional apps nearly impossible. For the price, it is okay.
customer_reviews.author: HHRB

customer_reviews.title: A great phone for the price
customer_reviews.text: A great phone for the price. I got this for my daughter to upgrade her other smartphone which was slow and had no memory. This one works like a dream
customer_reviews.author: Reads too much

customer_reviews.title: Wait for the "free minutes" until you activate!
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a good phone after two weeks of owning it. A bit confusing about the extra air time advertised; no refill card came with the package, so you only know it's included when you activate the phone. This is not described in the actual listed information.
customer_reviews.author: S. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Best phone at this price
customer_reviews.text: For the $100 I paid this is an excellent phone. Combined with Android 6.0 it should be a pretty capable smartphone for some time to come. TracFone service is a good value for the light phone user.
customer_reviews.author: Richard M. Lippincott

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last long and display started failing.
customer_reviews.text: Didn't last long and display started going out now is unuseable with lines across it. Only had it a short while past the return date.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Seed

customer_reviews.title: Good phone
customer_reviews.text: So far good phone. I get mad at it sometimes because my fingers are big and the phone is set up for small fingers, The camera is exceptional. And it would be great if it had more storage available.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Love this phone
customer_reviews.text: Love this phone! I wasn't sure about it but it has exceeded my expectations. Easy to use and no contracts! I love not having a contract! You can but the minutes you need, put the code in your phone and minutes are added. It's perfect!
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: This is my favorite cell phone yet.
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite cell phone yet. Has a nice big screen, has a newer operating system, and the price is definitely right. it's not too big.
customer_reviews.author: Gi'me my stuff!!!!

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: Good phone for the price. Would but another one or upgrade
customer_reviews.author: blesseed

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Seems OK but I haven't spent the time learning all the bells & whistles!
customer_reviews.author: Lauralu

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone easy to navigate. words large enough to read,

product_meta.title: TracFone Samsung Galaxy J1 Luna 4G LTE Prepaid Smartphone with Free $30 Airtime Bundle
product_meta.description: The TracFone Samsung Galaxy Luna Android prepaid smartphone serves as a useful alternative to people who don't want to commit to a month-to-month cell service plan. With this item, you can pay as-you-go. This allows you to track the amount of money you're spending easily. This prepaid smartphone comes fully loaded with a wide variety of applications, including Wi-Fi, GPS and Bluetooth. With it, you can access over a million other apps on Google play. It comes with a camera, so you can snap shots and share them with friends. Use the MP3 player to listen to your favorite music. This Android smartphone supports a microSD memory card of up to 32GB. It should be noted that the memory card does not come included in the packaging and can be bought separately. This LG smartphone comes with up to seven hours of talk time.
feature_bullets: 4.5" super AMOLED screen; Android 6.0 (Marshmallow); 5 MP camera1.2 GHz quad-core processor;
Promotional package includes 120-minute pin (tripled to 360 minutes, 360 text messages and 360MB of data) with 90 days of service
Triple minutes for life (you receive minutes and texts and data for each minute you add)
Phone + airtime bundles do not include a physical card. Airtime is installed on the phone upon activation.
